Title: Beat the Demons Out of It
Description:
He can be very stubborn, I'm afraid.

But I can't just give up on him. We'll just have to try again! 

There are more paintings still out there he threw out. These were in even more dangerous locations, so I hope you are up for the challenge!
ObjectivesText: Recover Hudson's Lost Paintings from the final bosses of the Halls of Infusion, Algeth'ar Academy, Azure Vault, and Neltharus dungeons.
